availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Adair County merchant and tobacco dealer. Held sixteen slaves in 1860 as guardian for W. W. Overstreet and S. S. Overstreet. Partner in trade with S. Taylor in 1864.

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Cumberland County, District 2. U.S. IRS Tax Assessment Lists, 1862-1918, Ancestry, Kentucky, 1864, Collection District 2, Division 10, p. 93. U.S. IRS Tax Assessment Lists, 1862-1918, Ancestry, Kentucky, 1864, Collection District 2, Division 3, p. 15.
